head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KUEHSEL, VERA M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KUEHSEL, VERA M.

block.p: KUEHSEL-Vera M. Age 91, of Mount Vernon, NY. Formerly of Flushing, NY, died August 25, 2000. Wife of the late William, mother of William P. Kuehsel and Marilyn Daly. Grandmother of four. Reposing Pelham Funeral Home, 64 Lincoln Avenue, Pelham, NY on Sunday 2:00-4:00 and 7:00-9:00 PM. Mass Our Lady of Perpetual Help Church on Monday at 10:00 AM. Donations to The American Heart Association appreciated.
